snippet.title: The Ring: Terror's Realm ~ Trailer
snippet.description: Trailer FMV from Asmik Ace and Infogrames' clunky survival horror adventure The Ring: Terror's Realm (just Ring in Japan) for the Sega Dreamcast. Help Meg Rainman, together with her ex Jack Nikson, overcome the death of her boyfriend and the killer computer game/ghost virus that did him in.
